name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior CloudNative Engineer with over 13 years of experience in developing high-performance, cloud-native applications. Proficient in implementing **microservices**, **containers**, and **Kubernetes** architecture, ensuring scalable and reliable solutions. Skilled in utilizing **Golang** for backend development, enhancing distributed systems performance and automating processes with **developer tools**. Experienced in aligning development practices with **cloud-native** concepts and open-source technologies, significantly boosting productivity and efficiency.

Possesses strong expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on experience in frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing. Proficient in deploying applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, alongside managing **CI/CD pipelines** for continuous integration and delivery.

Well-versed in compliance-driven development, adhering to standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong background in **MLOps**, including model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
